description.value:
Fire

Aura 5

At the start of Ashardalon's turn, any creature within the aura takes 20 fire damage and is pulled 3 squares.

Basic Attack

At-Will âœ¦ Fire

Standard

Reach 4

+35 vs AC; 4d12+12 fire damage.

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Reach 4

+35 vs AC; 3d8+10 damage. This attack scores a critical hit on a roll of 18, 19, or 20 (a roll of 18 or 19 is not an automatic hit, however).

At-Will

Standard

Ashardalon makes two claw attacks and one bite attack

At-Will

Immediate Reaction

Trigger: When an enemy moves to a position where it flanks ashardalon, at-will

Ashardalon attacks the triggering enemy with his tail: reach 4; +32 vs Reflex; 6d10+12 damage, and the target is pushed 3 squares.

Recharge 5-6 âœ¦ Fire

Standard

Close burst 5

+33 vs Fortitude; 6d10+10 fire damage, and the target slides 5 squares and is immobilized (save ends).

Recharge 5-6 âœ¦ Fire

Standard

Close blast 5

+33 vs Reflex; 8d12+10 fire damage, and Ashardalon makes a secondary attack against the same target.

Secondary Attack +33 vs Fortitude; the target's fire resistance is negated until the end of the encounter. Miss: Half damage, and no secondary attack.

Encounter âœ¦ Psychic

Free

Trigger: When first bloodied, encounter

The dragon's breath weapon recharges, and the dragon uses it immediately.

Encounter âœ¦ Charm

Standard

Close burst 10

Targets enemies; +35 vs Will; the target is dominated until the end of Ashardalon's next turn. Aftereffect: The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends).

At-Will âœ¦ Fire

Standard, At-Will

Ashardalon explodes in a burst of flame; close burst 10; +33 vs Reflex; 4d10+15 fire damage. Miss: Half damage. In addition, a balor appears in part of the space formerly occupied by Ashardalon.

system.biography:
HP 1200; Bloodied 600
Regeneration 20
Resist 40 fire 		Init +22 | AP 2 | Save +5
AC 46Fort 48Ref 42Will 43
Speed 12, fly 12 (hover), overland flight 15
Ability ScoresStr 34 (+27)
Con 30 (+25)		Dex 25 (+22)
Int 22 (+21)		Wis 22 (+21)
Cha 19 (+19)
Languages Common, Draconic
Alignment Evil
Skills Bluff +24, Insight +26, Intimidate +24Senses Darkvision
Passive Perception 31 | Insight 36
